thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 42 2
thread.title: Jean-Marc Paquet
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Jean-Marc Paquet

author: Jean-Marc Paquet
title: Jean-Marc Paquet
text:
Hi,
I occasionally buy on Tomtop. I have been very satisfied with my two last purchases. In both cases I needed user support and received a first reply within two days. To me this is what makes the difference between just an on-line store and a site where I will return again and again.
regards,
jmp
